original_text: And the priest shall make an atonement for the soul that sinneth ignorantly, when he sinneth by ignorance before the Lord, to make an atonement for him; and it shall be forgiven him.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 부지중에 범죄한 사람이 부지중에 여호와 앞에 범한 죄를 위하여 속죄하여 그 죄를 속할지니 그리하면 사함을 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall make an atonement
for the soul that sinneth ignorantly
when he sinneth by ignorance before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 여호와 앞에서 무지로 범죄할 때에

sentences.original_text: to make an atonement for him
and it shall be forgiven him
